ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Would absolutely recommend. Loved this course! An excellent overview of basic immunology.

Yes I would recommend it. The lecturers were very strong and the information was very interesting. Although I have already taken Immunology as an undergraduate, I felt as though I was able to learn new information in a new light at many points during the semester.
Summary: excellent course to take for people interested in ImmunologyYes I would recommend it.
Of course I will recommend this course to a fellow student, because it is very interesting and the knowledge is very important to know.
I would definitely recommend this course. This course is an excellant introductory course to Immunobiology.

Yes, I will recommend this course to others because of two reasons.Firstly, you will be able to acquire comprehensive knowledge of immunology, which will be beneficial for future study, and research.Secondly, you will meet and absorb highly sophisticated ideas of the top immunologists in the world, which is more beneficial than anything else.
Take this course if you are interested in immunology.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course provided an excellent introduction to this field for me. I will likely incorporate concepts learned here into my dissertation research.

This course tremendously helps me with my basic knowledge about immunology. I am working in an immunology lab right now, and the knowledge I have learned in class greatly helps with understanding experiment protocol and papers I am reading.

This course was extremely useful for my current and future research in that it not only gave me fundamental knowledge of immunology but also convince us how important for the system to maintain the harmony and work together as a whole in order to keep our body healthy. This general idea is the one that all of us should keep in mind when we look into the abnormality of our immune system.
This course will be extremely useful if I pursue a field in immunology.
